name: Ninja Zombie Monster Truck - Road Kill Revenge Rally
name_original: Ninja Zombie Monster Truck - Road Kill Revenge Rally
description:
The Road Kill Revenge Rally has begun! Zombies everywhere! Climb aboard your Ninja Zombie Monster Truck and shoot them before they get you! Your skills and choice of Truck are your only hope for survival.

The apocalypse has happened but it’s not too late for you! It’s insane and it’s fun! It’s crazy fun!!

Zombies come out of nowhere and their speed increases. Gather gold coins to earn new trucks.

Challenge Your Friends for Highest Score!
Great Time-Killer Game!
Tons of fun!

Download ‘Ninja Zombie Monster Truck’ Now!!!
